snippet.title: [サテラビュー] パネルでポン イベントバージョン2 | Panel De Pon - Event Version 2 (audio fixed)
snippet.description:
(EDIT: Previous upload had an audio issue. AS USUAL. Fixed.)

Alright, I'm behind schedule on Satellaview ROM releases - I've been given the reminder to release the BS Sim City ROM, and I think for that I'll try working on a sorta-decent "release" video tomorrow or such, but I still wanna do my raw recording logs, so let me get to these now...

So, remember when a "Wario no Mori Event Version 2" was ROM dumped? Seems Panel de Pon also has such - which probably means an Event Version 1 is unaccounted for. This likely broadcast before "Event 98" or "Yoshi no Panepon" did, which would explain why it is more obscure.

In this version you have access to Endless and Stage Clear mode from the main game - all other "normal" modes of play are locked. But this also has one exclusive mode - the "Event 2" mode. In this mode, you're given 4 minutes 45 seconds to go through some challenging VS. rounds, and then spend a short 15 seconds racking up one final chain, all for a score and password to send to St.GIGA for an event prize.

I don't have much more info on this one.

YouTube is telling me to tell people to join and become a member for reasons, so here's the link for that ~
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOXvfoAZZJhmDZw0boGkSYA/join
